headline: Expansion of U.S. Manufacturing and Tezspire Approval Might Change the Case for Investing in Amgen (AMGN)
summary: Amgen recently announced a US$650 million expansion of its U.S. manufacturing network, including upgrades at its Juncos facility and nearly 750 new jobs, while its co-developed medicine Tezspire received a positive recommendation in the EU for treating chronic rhinosinusitis with nasal polyps based on successful phase 3 trial results. The manufacturing investment and regulatory progress for Tezspire point to Amgen's ongoing efforts to strengthen domestic production and expand its reach in...
